extensionDescription.message: Turn selected text in a web site into voice speech using ResponsiveVoice.JS

titleManualVoiceSelect.message: Available only when you disable auto language detection option

labelPreferableVoice.message: Please select your preferable voice for auto detection.

titlePreferableVoice.message:
Some languages have multiple associated voices.
Please select a voice to stream if text is composed of those language.
